title: AMENRA Announces European Tour
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 25 seconds ago
text: Amenra is kicking off their 2025 with a handful of European tour dates. The tour kicks off on April 21 at Im Wizeman in Stuttgart, Germany and wraps up at the illustrious Desertfest in London on May 17. Get your tickets here and check out Amenra's latest record Skunk below. 4/21 Stuttgart, GER Im Wizeman4/22 Koln, GER Carlswerk Victoria4/23 Hamburg, GER Uebel & Gefährlich4/24 Berlin, GER Astra4/25 Warsaw, POL Oczki4/26 Krakow, POL Kwadrat4/27 Dresden, GER Beatpol4/28 Prague, CZE Palac Akropolis4/30 Vienna, AUT Arena5/1 Budapest, HUN A385/2 Zagreb, CRO Boogaloo Club5/3 Munich, GER Backstage Halle5/4 Bologna, ITA TPO5/5 Rome, ITA Monk Club5/6 Milano, ITA Legend Club5/7 Lausanne, SWI Les Docks5/8 Lyon, FRA CCO5/9 Marseille, FRA Espace Julien5/11 Barcelona, SPA Apolo5/12 Toulouse, FRA Cabane5/13 Biarritz, FRA Atabal5/14 Rennes, FRA Antipode5/15 Paris, FRA Elysee Montmartre5/17 London, UK Desertfest Want More Metal? html:
Amenra is kicking off their 2025 with a handful of European tour dates. The tour kicks off on April 21 at Im Wizeman in Stuttgart, Germany and wraps up at the illustrious Desertfest in London on May 17. Get your tickets here and check out Amenra's latest record Skunk below.

4/22 Koln, GER Carlswerk Victoria
